common.tagline: Simple, fast, and local-first SEO tools
common.slogan: Simple, fast, and local-first SEO tools for developers and creators.

hero.title: Your Complete SEO Toolkit
hero.subtitle: 16 powerful client-side tools to optimize your website's search engine performance. Fast, free, and privacy-focused.

serpSimulator.name: SERP Simulator
serpSimulator.description: Preview how your page will appear in Google search results
serpSimulator.metaTitle: Google SERP Simulator: Preview Your Search Result
serpSimulator.metaDescription: Preview how your website appears in Google search results. Optimize meta titles and descriptions instantly.
serpSimulator.title: Page Title

content.title: What is a SERP Simulator?
content.howToUse: Enter your page title, meta description, and URL in the fields above. The real-time preview shows exactly how your result will appear on Google. Use the character indicators to ensure your content won't be truncated.
content.whyImportant: Your search result appearance directly impacts click-through rate (CTR). An attractive title and persuasive meta description can significantly increase organic traffic, even without ranking position changes.
content.goldenTip: Use numbers, questions, or action words in your title to boost CTR. Examples: '7 Essential Tips...' or 'How to Increase...' work great.

schemaGenerator.name: Schema JSON-LD Generator
schemaGenerator.description: Generate structured data for rich snippets
schemaGenerator.metaTitle: Schema JSON-LD Generator: Structured Data for SEO
schemaGenerator.metaDescription: Generate structured data markup (Schema.org) for local businesses and articles. Improve your rich snippets.

content.title: What is Schema Markup?
content.howToUse: Select the schema type (Local Business or Article) and fill in the relevant fields. The JSON-LD code will be generated automatically. Copy and paste it into your HTML <head> section.
content.whyImportant: Structured data helps search engines better understand your content, enabling rich snippets like star ratings, prices, and contact information directly in search results.
content.goldenTip: Always test your schema using Google's Rich Results Test before publishing to ensure it's working correctly.

robotsGenerator.name: Robots.txt Generator
robotsGenerator.description: Create custom robots.txt rules for crawlers
robotsGenerator.metaTitle: Free Robots.txt Generator: Create SEO Robots Files
robotsGenerator.metaDescription: Easily generate a robots.txt file to guide search engine crawlers and improve your site's indexing strategy.

content.title: What is a Robots.txt File?
content.howToUse: Select the desired user agent and check the blocking rules. Add your sitemap URL and configure the crawl delay if needed. The file will be generated automatically for you to copy.
content.whyImportant: The robots.txt controls which pages search engines can crawl. A well-configured file prevents sensitive content from being indexed and optimizes your site's crawl budget.
content.goldenTip: Never accidentally block your CSS and JavaScript files - Google needs them to properly render your pages.

wordCounter.name: Word Counter & Density
wordCounter.description: Analyze word frequency and keyword density
wordCounter.metaDescription: Analyze word frequency and keyword density in your content. Optimize your text for better SEO performance.
wordCounter.placeholder: Paste your text here to analyze word count and keyword density...

content.title: Why Count Words and Analyze Density?
content.howToUse: Paste your text in the left field. The tool will automatically calculate total words, unique words, and show the most frequent keywords with their percentage density.
content.whyImportant: Keyword density helps avoid keyword stuffing (excessive repetition) which can result in penalties. A healthy balance is between 1-3% for your main keyword.
content.goldenTip: Focus on semantic variations of your main keyword instead of repeating the same word. This creates more natural and comprehensive content.

metaAnalyzer.name: Meta Tags Analyzer
metaAnalyzer.description: Extract and analyze meta tags from any URL
metaAnalyzer.metaTitle: Meta Tags Analyzer: Extract SEO Meta Data
metaAnalyzer.metaDescription: Extract and analyze meta tags from any URL. Check titles, descriptions, and Open Graph tags instantly.
metaAnalyzer.title: Title
metaAnalyzer.note: Note: This tool simulates meta tag extraction. For actual URL analysis, a backend service would be required.

content.title: What are Meta Tags?
content.howToUse: Enter the URL of the page you want to analyze and click analyze. The tool will automatically extract all important meta tags including title, description, and Open Graph tags.
content.whyImportant: Meta tags are fundamental for on-page SEO. They inform search engines about page content and control how it appears in search results and social media.
content.goldenTip: Regularly check your meta tags after content updates to ensure they're still optimized and relevant.

sitemapGenerator.name: Sitemap XML Generator
sitemapGenerator.description: Convert a list of URLs into valid XML sitemap
sitemapGenerator.metaTitle: XML Sitemap Generator: Create Valid Sitemaps
sitemapGenerator.metaDescription: Convert your list of URLs into a valid XML sitemap. Improve search engine crawling and indexing.
sitemapGenerator.urlsPlaceholder:
Enter URLs (one per line):
https://example.com/
https://example.com/about
https://example.com/contact

content.title: What is an XML Sitemap?
content.howToUse: List all your site's URLs (one per line), select the update frequency and priority. The tool will generate a valid XML sitemap that you can download and submit to search engines.
content.whyImportant: A sitemap helps search engines discover and index all your site's pages, especially new pages or those with few internal links.
content.goldenTip: Submit your sitemap in Google Search Console and Bing Webmaster Tools to monitor your pages' indexing.

webpConverter.name: Image to WebP Converter
webpConverter.description: Convert images to WebP format for better performance
webpConverter.metaTitle: Image to WebP Converter: Optimize Images Online
webpConverter.metaDescription: Convert JPG, PNG, and GIF images to WebP format for faster loading. Reduce image size without losing quality.
webpConverter.dropzone: Drop an image here or click to upload

content.title: What is WebP Format?
content.howToUse: Drag an image to the upload area or click to select a file. Adjust the desired quality and download the optimized WebP version.
content.whyImportant: WebP images are up to 30% smaller than JPG and PNG, improving page loading speed - an important ranking factor for Google.
content.goldenTip: Use WebP with fallback for older browsers using the HTML5 <picture> tag for maximum compatibility.

hreflangGenerator.name: Hreflang Tags Generator
hreflangGenerator.description: Generate hreflang tags for multilingual sites
hreflangGenerator.metaTitle: Hreflang Tags Generator: Multilingual SEO Tool
hreflangGenerator.metaDescription: Generate hreflang tags for multilingual websites. Improve international SEO and avoid duplicate content issues.

content.title: What are Hreflang Tags?
content.howToUse: Add the base URL and all language versions of your site. The tool will automatically generate the correct hreflang tags for each page.
content.whyImportant: Hreflang tags tell search engines which language version to show to each user, avoiding duplicate content issues on multilingual sites.
content.goldenTip: Always include an x-default tag for users whose language isn't available on your site.

linkValidator.name: Link Validator
linkValidator.description: Identify internal vs external links in HTML
linkValidator.metaTitle: Link Validator: Analyze Internal & External Links
linkValidator.metaDescription: Identify and categorize internal vs external links in your HTML code. Audit your link structure easily.

content.title: Why Validate Your Links?
content.howToUse: Paste your page's HTML code and enter your domain. The tool will identify and categorize all links as internal or external.
content.whyImportant: A good internal link structure distributes authority among your pages, while external links to trusted sites increase your content's credibility.
content.goldenTip: Regularly check for broken links (404) that hurt user experience and SEO.

utmGenerator.name: UTM Link Generator
utmGenerator.description: Create tracking URLs for marketing campaigns
utmGenerator.metaTitle: UTM Link Generator: Create Campaign Tracking URLs
utmGenerator.metaDescription: Generate UTM tracking URLs for your marketing campaigns. Track traffic sources in Google Analytics easily.

content.title: What are UTM Parameters?
content.howToUse: Fill in the destination URL and UTM parameters (source, medium, campaign). The tool will generate a complete URL with tracking parameters.
content.whyImportant: UTM parameters allow you to track the exact origin of traffic in Google Analytics, essential for measuring marketing campaign ROI.
content.goldenTip: Maintain a consistent naming convention (e.g., always lowercase, underscores) to make data analysis easier.

lsiKeywords.name: LSI Keywords Extractor
lsiKeywords.description: Identify semantically related terms in your text
lsiKeywords.metaTitle: LSI Keywords Extractor: Find Semantic Terms
lsiKeywords.metaDescription: Extract LSI keywords and semantically related terms from your text. Improve your content's relevance.
lsiKeywords.placeholder: Paste your text here to extract LSI keywords...
lsiKeywords.emptyState: Enter text to extract the most frequent keywords.

content.title: What are LSI Keywords?
content.howToUse: Paste a text or article in the left field. The tool will automatically analyze and extract the most frequent terms, ranked by relevance.
content.whyImportant: LSI (Latent Semantic Indexing) keywords are related terms that help search engines better understand your content's context, improving ranking for semantic searches.
content.goldenTip: Use identified LSI keywords naturally throughout your text, especially in subheadings and opening paragraphs.

seoChecklist.name: Interactive SEO Checklist
seoChecklist.description: Complete checklist for on-page and technical optimization
seoChecklist.metaDescription: Use our interactive checklist to ensure your site meets all on-page and technical SEO requirements.

items.h1Tag: Only one H1 per page with keyword
items.imageAlt: All images with descriptive alt text
items.readability: Easy to read and scan text
items.sitemapXml: XML sitemap submitted to search engines
items.ogTags: Open Graph tags for social media

content.title: Complete SEO Checklist
content.howToUse: Check off each item as you optimize your page. Progress is saved automatically. Use this checklist as a guide to ensure no important SEO aspect is forgotten.
content.whyImportant: A systematic SEO approach ensures all ranking factors are considered. Many sites lose positions by neglecting basic aspects.
content.goldenTip: Review this checklist for every new content published and do monthly audits on important pages.

faviconSimulator.name: Favicon Simulator
faviconSimulator.description: Preview how your favicon appears in browser and Google
faviconSimulator.metaDescription: See how your favicon appears in browser tabs, bookmarks, and Google Mobile search results.

content.title: What is a Favicon?
content.howToUse: Enter your site name and upload your favicon. See instantly how it will appear in browser tabs, bookmarks, and Google mobile search results.
content.whyImportant: A professional favicon increases brand recognition and user trust. On Google Mobile, the favicon appears in search results, impacting click-through rate.
content.goldenTip: Use a simple, recognizable icon in 16x16 and 32x32 pixels. Avoid details that become invisible at small sizes.

emailObfuscator.name: Email Obfuscator
emailObfuscator.description: Protect your email from bots and spam
emailObfuscator.metaDescription: Convert your email to bot-protected code. Multiple obfuscation methods available.
emailObfuscator.invalidEmail: Enter a valid email to see obfuscation options.
emailObfuscator.copiedDescription: The code has been copied to your clipboard.

content.title: Why Obfuscate Your Email?
content.howToUse: Enter your email and choose between different obfuscation methods. Copy the generated code and use it in your site's HTML.
content.whyImportant: Publishing plain-text emails attracts spam. Obfuscation keeps the email functional for real users while making it difficult for bots to harvest.
content.goldenTip: Combine multiple methods for greater protection. The CSS method is especially effective as it visually reverses the text.

diffChecker.name: Text Diff Checker
diffChecker.description: Compare two texts and highlight differences
diffChecker.metaTitle: Text Diff Checker: Compare Texts Online
diffChecker.metaDescription: Compare two texts side by side and see all differences highlighted. Useful for content review.

content.title: Text Diff Checker
content.howToUse: Paste the original text in the left field and the modified version on the right. Differences will be automatically highlighted in green (additions) and red (removals).
content.whyImportant: Comparing content versions helps track changes, review updates, and ensure important edits aren't lost during optimization.
content.goldenTip: Use this tool to compare meta descriptions before and after optimizations and measure CTR impact.

readabilityAnalyzer.name: Readability Analyzer
readabilityAnalyzer.description: Calculate your text's reading ease score
readabilityAnalyzer.metaDescription: Calculate your text's readability with the Flesch index. Optimize your content for better comprehension.
readabilityAnalyzer.placeholder: Paste your text here to analyze readability...

content.title: What is the Flesch Readability Index?
content.howToUse: Paste your text in the left field. The tool will automatically calculate the Flesch index, word count, sentences, and estimated reading time.
content.whyImportant: Easier-to-read texts have lower bounce rates and higher time-on-page - both positive signals for Google. A score above 60 is ideal for most web content.
content.goldenTip: Use short sentences (maximum 20 words) and avoid unnecessary technical jargon to improve readability.
